Implication: "A public speaker in a plaid shirt speaks on the microphone."
Referring expressions: A man, suit  Public speaker, plaid shirt, microphone.
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsWearing(a,b)))) -> (exists e (exists c (exists d (IsPublicSpeaker(c) and IsInPlaidShirt(d) and IsSpeakingOnMicrophone(e)))))
